short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse your Chrome tabs in a serene vibe with the Sakurako Blue Archive live wallpaper and minimalist design features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Sakurako Blue Archive Live Wallpaper extension brings the tranquil beauty of the Blue Archive universe to your Chrome new tabs. Featuring a stunning live wallpaper of Sakurako, this extension offers a perfect blend of calmness and elegance. The dynamic background showcases her charm, creating a peaceful atmosphere every time you open a new tab.

Designed with a minimalist approach, the extension includes a sleek digital clock and a Google search bar for practicality and simplicity. Customize your browsing experience by adding shortcuts to your favorite websites, ensuring easy access to what matters most. Whether you're a fan of Blue Archive or simply appreciate aesthetically pleasing visuals, this extension enhances your browsing experience with a soothing yet functional design. Transform your new tabs into a haven of calm with the Sakurako Blue Archive live wallpaper.
